participant_1.background:
I'm a musician who travels a lot, and I sometimes worry about my cats when I'm gone.
i like to make my own coffee.
I'm looking forward to starting my career and making a difference in the world.
I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things.
i watch jimmy allons show every night.

participant_2.background:
I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing.
I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts.
I have been struggling to find a way to explain my vegetarian diet to my girlfriend.
I watched my niece swim last year and thought she looked so free.
my name is mary and i am from colorado.

content.text: Hey Mary, how are you doing today?
Doing well! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too, it's going to be hot again, but I'm going to enjoy it.
I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing.
Have you tried using a leave-in conditioner? I find that helps a lot.
I'll have to try that, thanks for the tip!
You're welcome! What do you like to do on the weekends?
I like to go swimming, it's so refreshing.
I love swimming too! I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
It doesn't matter if you're good at it, it's just fun to get out in the water.
I agree, it's a great way to relax.
I'm glad we agree! I'm going to go get ready for the weekend, have a good one!
